com.stripe.android

Class StripeTextUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stripe.android.StripeTextUtils

  • public class StripeTextUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for common text-related operations on Stripe data coming from the server.

    • Method Detail

      • nullIfBlank

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String nullIfBlank(@Nullable
                                                     java.lang.String value)
        Swap null for blank text values.
        Parameters:
        value - an input string that may or may not be entirely whitespace
        Returns:
        null if the string is entirely whitespace, otherwise the input value

      • emptyIfNull

        @NonNull
public static java.lang.String emptyIfNull(@Nullable
                                                    java.lang.String value)

      • isBlank

        public static boolean isBlank(@Nullable
                              java.lang.String value)
        A checker for whether or not the input value is entirely whitespace. This is slightly more aggressive than the android TextUtils#isEmpty method, which only returns true for null or "".
        Parameters:
        value - a possibly blank input string value
        Returns:
        true if and only if the value is all whitespace, null, or empty

      • isEmpty

        public static boolean isEmpty(@Nullable
                              java.lang.CharSequence str)
        Returns true if the string is null or 0-length.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to be examined
        Returns:
        true if str is null or zero length

      • removeSpacesAndHyphens

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String removeSpacesAndHyphens(@Nullable
                                                                java.lang.String cardNumberWithSpaces)
        Converts a card number that may have spaces between the numbers into one without any spaces. Note: method does not check that all characters are digits or spaces.
        Parameters:
        cardNumberWithSpaces - a card number, for instance "4242 4242 4242 4242"
        Returns:
        the input number minus any spaces, for instance "4242424242424242". Returns null if the input was null or all spaces.
